text: The following lists events in the year 2019 in Belize. ==Incumbents== * Monarch: Elizabeth II * Prime Minister: Dean Barrow * Governor-General: Colville Young ==Events== *8 May – The 2019 Belizean territorial dispute referendum (regarding the Belizean–Guatemalan territorial dispute) was held (originally scheduled for 10 April). Voters were asked whether the territorial dispute should be referred to the International Court of Justice, and the proposal was approved by 55% of the voters. ==Deaths== *2 March – Derek Aikman, politician (b. 1959). ==See also== * 2019 Pan American Games ==References== Category:2010s in Belize Category:Years of the 21st century in Belize Belize Belize
title: 2019 in Belize
